item.title: Unite to Buy Rival Empiric As UK Landlord Deals Surge
item.description: Unite Group Plc agreed to buy rival student landlord Empiric Student Property Plc in a deal valuing the company at about £723 million ($981 million), the latest evidence of the wave of consolidation s
